main.description: A record of daily activity rings (Apple Fitness), including move, exercise, and stand goals.

exercise.description: The total minutes of exercise completed.

exerciseGoal.description: The daily exercise goal in minutes.

move.description: The total active calories burned for the day.

moveGoal.description: The daily move goal in calories.

standGoal.description: The daily stand goal in hours.

standHours.description: The number of hours the user stood up and moved around.
